title: Romance isn't Dead
body:
Are you ready for love? This lot category's main benefits are doubled increases and decreases in relationships (due to the sexual tension, obviously) and the Heart Beds and Hot Tub, which can be used for... well, you figure it out. 

Motives: [s][color=#B3FF99]Easy[/color][/s], Speciality: [s]Love Beds, Heart Hot Tub[/s] 
[s][color=white]Overfill: 100% Hygiene & Social, Relationships: 2x Multiplier[/color][/s]
[s][color=#FF9999]Skills are always disabled on this property category for visitors.[/color][/s]
